alert.note: Alert for Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southwest Big Horn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 15 at 1:58PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Light Snow and Gusty Winds Starting Wednesday Night... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Light to possibly moderate snow. Snowfall accumulations up to 1 inch expected; 1 to 2 inches in the mountains. North to northwest winds, with gusts of 25 to 35 mph, will lead to blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Southern portions of the Bighorn Basin and the Owl Creek/Bridger Mountains. * WHEN...8 PM Wednesday to 12 PM Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel on roadways will be impacted by winter driving conditions and lowered visibility at times through Wednesday night into Thursday morning. Blowing and drifting snow will occur.

area.areaDesc: Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southwest Big Horn Basin
